success_scorecard.impact_summary: Promoted a core pedagogical engine feature and evolved visual analytics for students.

what_went_well: Seamless promotion of Adaptive Difficulty logic.
Effective integration of PracticeSummaryChart into the main dashboard.
unexpected_opportunities: The promoted telemetry data can now be directly used by the Heatmap without flag checks.

impact_assessment.user_impact: Students now have a permanent personalized difficulty engine and better visual progress tracking.
impact_assessment.technical_debt_reduction: Removed 1 feature flag and simplified engine conditional logic.
